701338f-a.title: Bronx: Jerome Avenue - 170th Street (West)
701338f-a.text:
Jerome Ave., west side, at West 170th Street. The W.P.A. men are working on a little park directly to the west of the elevated structure of the I.R.T. subway which runs on Jerome Ave. The view is southward
toward West 170th Street.
November 6, 1936.
Works Progress Administration.
Federal Art Project photo.

701337f-a.title: Bronx: Jerome Avenue - 170th Street (West)
701337f-a.text:
1405 Jerome Ave. (formerly Macombs Road), adjoining the N.W. corner of Test 170th Street. This house is at this date (1938), no longer in existence. It was replaced by the 10estory Santini Brothers
warehouse.
About 1923.
W. B. Vernam.
